title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content: Silent Library. After defeating the enemies, press the buttons to unlock the gate of the Treasure Room. Interact with the plinth and put the book Teachings of Loss: The Nightsinger on it. That book is the answer to "What can silence the Nightsong?‚Äù (Disarm the trap before taking the book.) Once you Placed the right book, the door to Treasure Room will open. Inside, you can find the following: Dark Justiciar Helmet, Dark Justiciar Half-Plate, and the weapon to kill the Nightsong -- Spear of Night
